about_the_game:
This is a unique 3D game that integrates a variety of classic board games, creating a new gaming world for you. In this world, you can choose to have intense online battles with friends or strangers on the network, or you can choose to strategize against intelligent AI, or share the fun of the game with your friends in local mode.

The features of the game are as follows:


1. The game includes a variety of board games, including Connect Four, Dots and Boxes, Checkers, Track Chess, Blackjack, Backgammon, etc. Each game has its unique charm and strategy, waiting for you to challenge and explore.

2. The game supports multiple ways to play. You can choose to play alone, enjoy the independent fun of the game, or choose to play locally, share the joy of the game with friends, or choose to play online, compete with global players, support remote play, and let you enjoy the fun of the game anytime, anywhere.

3. The game uses realistic 3D game graphics, simulates the game effects of the real world, and brings you an immersive gaming experience. Every detail is carefully designed, making you feel as if you are in a real game.

4. The game supports free switching between local and online game modes. You can play alone while waiting for a match, without wasting any time, making your gaming experience smoother.

5. The game has a global leaderboard. Here you can see the rankings of global players, challenge yourself, strive for higher rankings, and show your gaming strength.

6. The game supports multiple handle operations, making your gaming experience more colorful. Whether you like to use the keyboard or the gamepad, you can find the most suitable operation method for you.

This game will bring you an unprecedented gaming experience, let you find fun in the game, challenge yourself, and compete with global players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium(R)Dual-Core CPU E5200 2.50GHZ or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.80 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gerforce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
